english.segment1: I hear the Savior say, Thy strength indeed is small!. Child of weakness, watch and pray, Find in Me thine all in all
english.segment2: CHORUS:Jesus paid it all. All to Him I owe. Sin had left a crimson stain. He washed it white as snow
english.segment3: Lord, now indeed I find. Thy power, and Thine alone, Can change the leper's spots. And melt the heart of stone
english.segment5: For nothing good have I. Where-by Thy grace to claim. I'll wash my garments white. In the blood of Calvary's Lamb
english.segment7: And when before the throne. I stand in Him complete. Jesus died my soul to save. My lips shall still repeat
